import React,{useState}from'react';import{testGeminiAPIConnection}from'../services/aiService';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ApiTester=()=>{const[testResult,setTestResult]=useState(null);const[isLoading,setIsLoading]=useState(false);const runTest=async()=>{setIsLoading(true);try{const result=await testGeminiAPIConnection();setTestResult(result);console.log("API Test result:",result);}catch(error){setTestResult({success:false,message:error.message});}finally{setIsLoading(false);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"p-3 border rounded my-2 text-sm bg-gray-50",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex justify-between items-center",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"font-semibold",children:"API Connection Troubleshooter"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:runTest,disabled:isLoading,className:"px-3 py-1 bg-blue-500 text-white rounded hover:bg-blue-600 disabled:bg-gray-300",children:isLoading?"Testing...":"Test API Connection"})]}),testResult&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"mt-2",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:`font-bold ${testResult.success?'text-green-600':'text-red-600'}`,children:testResult.success?'✅ Connection Successful':'❌ Connection Failed'}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"mt-1",children:testResult.message}),testResult.statusCode&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:["Status code: ",testResult.statusCode]}),testResult.responseText&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"mt-2",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"font-semibold",children:"Response:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("pre",{className:"bg-gray-100 p-2 rounded text-xs overflow-auto max-h-40 mt-1",children:testResult.responseText})]})]})]});};export default ApiTester;
